document_data.mainbody:
uskyn Waelvor was an elven inhabitant of Cormanthyr in the 3 century DR, and the head of his house, Waelvor.
To Amaranthae Auglamyr in , should Symrustar Auglamyr tell him about Elandorrs attempts at wooing her, Kuskyn would be so distraught by his son wooing anyone, let alone someone of as low status as House Auglamyr, that hed cage Elandorr Waelvor immediately and for a long time. She also spoke of him using a spell-cage, suggesting he was known to be a wizard.
